entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Oxbow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -29.8°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 43 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
